mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM STF_TB STF, ADMN_TB ADMN, RNK_TB RNK, DPT_DIV_TB DD WHERE ADMN.ADMNN_SQ = STF.ADMN_SQ AND RNK.RNK_SQ = STF.RNK_SQ AND DD.DPT_SQ = STF.DPT_SQ2
SELECT STF.STF_NM, RNK.RNK_NM, DD.DPT_NM FROM STF_TB STF, ADMN_TB ADMN, RNK_TB RNK, DPT_DIV_TB DD WHERE ADMN.ADMNN_SQ = STF.ADMN_SQ AND RNK.RNK_SQ = STF.RNK_SQ AND DD.DPT_SQ = STF.DPT_SQ2
SELECT ADMNN_SQ, ADMN_PW FROM ADMN_TB ORDER BY ADMNN_SQ
SELECT RNK_SQ, RNK_NM FROM RNK_TB ORDER BY RNK_SQ
SELECT DPT_SQ, DPT_NM FROM DPT_DIV_TB ORDER BY DPT_SQ
